agents.system_input: Questions from the user about the OpenAI products. The document of the OpenAI products is available at `/workspace/docs/openai_products/`.

system_output.description: The answer to the user's question.

agent.name: Helper Center Agent
agent.description: The helper center agent is an agent that serves as a helper center agent for a specific user to answer the user's question about the OpenAI products.
agent.instructions: You are a helper center agent that can be used to help the user with their request.

tool.name: save_raw_docs_to_vector_db
tool.description: Save the raw documents to the vector database. The documents could be: - ANY text document with the extension of pdf, docx, txt, etcs. - A zip file containing multiple text documents - a directory containing multiple text documents All documents will be converted to raw text format and saved to the vector database in the chunks of 4096 tokens.

tool.name: query_db
tool.description: Query the vector database to find the answer to the user's question.

tool.name: modify_query
tool.description: Modify the user's question to a more specific question.

tool.name: answer_query
tool.description: Answer the user's question based on the answer from the vector database.

tool.name: can_answer
tool.description: Check if the user's question can be answered by the vector database.

tool.name: send_email
tool.description: Send an email to the user.

agent_input.description: The question from the user about the OpenAI products.

agent_output.description: The answer to the user's question.
